theStarKnight:DarkHelm_SKRelic.NAME: Dark Helm
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 max HP at the end of each combat.

theStarKnight:MawHelm_SKRelic.NAME: Maw Helm
theStarKnight:MawHelm_SKRelic.FLAVOR: Its mangled form hides something writhing within.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 max HP at the end of each combat.

theStarKnight:AsteroidBelt_SKRelic.NAME: Asteroid Belt
DESCRIPTIONS: When you take damage, add a Comet to your hand.

theStarKnight:DyingSpark_SKRelic.NAME: Dying Spark
theStarKnight:DyingSpark_SKRelic.FLAVOR: A portent of things to come.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your library, gain 1 strength.

theStarKnight:Hypnos_SKRelic.NAME: Bust of Hypnos
theStarKnight:Hypnos_SKRelic.FLAVOR: A stone bust with immense, sunken, and widely luminous eyes.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter a rest site, upgrade a random card.

theStarKnight:TuningFork_SKRelic.NAME: Tuning Fork
DESCRIPTIONS: When you exhaust a card gain 3 block.

theStarKnight:Telescope_SKRelic.NAME: Telescope
theStarKnight:Telescope_SKRelic.FLAVOR: Looking through it, you see the most wondrous and horrible things.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, scry 6.

theStarKnight:TinyLighthouse_SKRelic.NAME: Tiny Lighthouse
theStarKnight:TinyLighthouse_SKRelic.FLAVOR: It leers down, winking hideously like an insane watching eye.
DESCRIPTIONS: First turn, heal 2 HP NL Second turn, gain 1 energy. NL Third turn, gain 5 vigor. NL Fourth turn, gain 10 block.

theStarKnight:KleinBottle_SKRelic.NAME: Klein Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose a card. Start each combat with this card in your discard. If the card costs more than 1, it's cost becomes 1.
starts each battle in your discard pile and cost a maximum of 1 to play.

theStarKnight:ThreeEyedStatue_SKRelic.NAME: Three Eyed Statue
theStarKnight:ThreeEyedStatue_SKRelic.FLAVOR: I've inadvertently broken several fundamental theories regarding this universe.
DESCRIPTIONS: You gain 1 less energy and draw 2 less cards each turn but get two turns.

theStarKnight:MeteorShower_SKRelic.NAME: Meteor Shower
DESCRIPTIONS: Start combat with a Falling Star in your hand.
